item.title: [cmr] Opal Palace
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. If you spend this mana to cast your commander, it enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of times it's been cast from the command zone this game.

item.title: [cmr] Rupture Spire
item.description:
Land

Rupture Spire enters the battlefield tapped.

When Rupture Spire enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [cmr] Timely Ward
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

You may cast this spell as though it had flash if it targets a commander.

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature has indestructible.

item.title: [cmr] Condemn
item.description:
Instant

Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

item.title: [cmr] Danitha Capashen, Paragon
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Knight

First strike, vigilance, lifelink

Aura and Equipment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

item.title: [cmr] Dawn Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

• Regenerate target creature.

• Counter target spell that targets you.

item.title: [cmr] Disenchant
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [cmr] Faith Unbroken
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature you control

When Faith Unbroken enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Faith Unbroken leaves the battlefield.

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

item.title: [cmr] Flickerwisp
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Flying

When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [cmr] Ironclad Slayer
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

When Ironclad Slayer enters the battlefield, you may return target Aura or Equipment card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [cmr] Martial Coup
item.description:
Sorcery

Create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. If X is 5 or more, destroy all other creatures.

item.title: [cmr] Odric, Lunarch Marshal
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Soldier

At the beginning of each combat, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn if a creature you control has first strike. The same is true for flying, deathtouch, double strike, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, skulk, trample, and vigilance.

item.title: [cmr] On Serra's Wings
item.description:
Legendary Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature is legendary, gets +1/+1, and has flying, vigilance, and lifelink.

item.title: [cmr] Relic Seeker
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

When Relic Seeker becomes renowned, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [cmr] Oreskos Explorer
item.description:
Creature — Cat Scout

When Oreskos Explorer enters the battlefield, search your library for up to X Plains cards, where X is the number of players who control more lands than you. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [cmr] Spirit Mantle
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has protection from creatures.

item.title: [cmr] Sigarda's Aid
item.description:
Enchantment

You may cast Aura and Equipment spells as though they had flash.

Whenever an Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach it to target creature you control.

item.title: [cmr] Sram, Senior Edificer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dwarf Advisor

Whenever you cast an Aura, Equipment, or Vehicle spell, draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Swords to Plowshares
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

item.title: [cmr] Unquestioned Authority
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

When Unquestioned Authority enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Enchanted creature has protection from creatures.

item.title: [cmr] Unbreakable Formation
item.description:
Instant

Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures and they gain vigilance until end of turn.

item.title: [cmr] White Sun's Zenith
item.description:
Instant

Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens. Shuffle White Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

item.title: [cmr] Valorous Stance
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

• Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.

item.title: [cmr] Winds of Rath
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures that aren't enchanted. They can't be regenerated.

item.title: [cmr] Alharu, Solemn Ritualist
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Monk

When Alharu, Solemn Ritualist enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.

Whenever a nontoken creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

item.title: [cmr] Soul of Eternity
item.description:
Creature — Avatar

Soul of Eternity's power and toughness are each equal to your life total.

Encore {7}{W}{W} ({7}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [cmr] Swords to Plowshares
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

item.title: [cmr] Triumphant Reckoning
item.description:
Sorcery

Return all artifact, enchantment, and planeswalker cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [cmr] Alharu, Solemn Ritualist
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Monk

When Alharu, Solemn Ritualist enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.

Whenever a nontoken creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

item.title: [cmr] Akroma's Will
item.description:
Instant

Choose one. If you control a commander as you cast this spell, you may choose both.

• Creatures you control gain flying, vigilance, and double strike until end of turn.

• Creatures you control gain lifelink, indestructible, and protection from all colors until end of turn.

item.title: [cmr] Angel of the Dawn
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

When Angel of the Dawn enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)

item.title: [cmr] Fencing Ace
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

item.title: [cmr] Dispeller's Capsule
item.description:
Artifact

{2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Dispeller's Capsule: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [cmr] Angelic Gift
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

When Angelic Gift enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Enchanted creature has flying.

item.title: [cmr] Open the Armory
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for an Aura or Equipment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [cmr] Make a Stand
item.description:
Instant

Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

item.title: [cmr] Iona's Judgment
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile target creature or enchantment.

item.title: [cmr] Seraph of Dawn
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

item.title: [cmr] Palace Sentinels
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

When Palace Sentinels enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

item.title: [cmr] Orzhov Advokist
item.description:
Creature — Human Advisor

At the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. If a player does, creatures that player controls can't attack you or a planeswalker you control until your next turn.

item.title: [cmr] Slaughter the Strong
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player chooses any number of creatures they control with total power 4 or less, then sacrifices all other creatures they control.

item.title: [cmr] Skywhaler's Shot
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature with power 3 or greater. Scry 1.

item.title: [cmr] Soul of Eternity
item.description:
Creature — Avatar

Soul of Eternity's power and toughness are each equal to your life total.

Encore {7}{W}{W} ({7}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [cmr] Slith Ascendant
item.description:
Creature — Slith

Flying

Whenever Slith Ascendant deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [cmr] Triumphant Reckoning
item.description:
Sorcery

Return all artifact, enchantment, and planeswalker cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [cmr] Squad Captain
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

Squad Captain enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other creature you control.

item.title: [cmr] Trusty Packbeast
item.description:
Creature — Beast

When Trusty Packbeast enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [cmr] Aven Surveyor
item.description:
Creature — Bird Scout

Flying

When Aven Surveyor enters the battlefield, choose one —

• Put a +1/+1 counter on Aven Surveyor.

• Return target creature to its owner's hand.

item.title: [cmr] Aqueous Form
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature can't be blocked.

Whenever enchanted creature attacks, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [cmr] Azure Fleet Admiral
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate

When Azure Fleet Admiral enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

Azure Fleet Admiral can't be blocked by creatures the monarch controls.
